value.title: Track all your social media channels EASILY in Power BI | Social media tracker template included 😊
value.excerpt: Track all your social media channels EASILY in Power BI | Social media tracker template included 😊  I finally was able to create a Power BI report to track all my social media accounts and not only I am going to share it with you, I will also show you how I created it so you can do it too.
